mapper.select: /* site.program.service.ProgramService.selectProgramNo */ SELECT SQ_OPTR_PGM.NEXTVAL AS OPTR_PGM_NO FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: /* site.program.service.ProgramService.insertProgramHandle */ INSERT INTO TB_OPTR_PGM_INFO ( OPTR_PGM_NO, OPTR_PGM_ID, OPTR_PGM_URL_V, OPTR_PGM_GRP_NO, OPTR_PGM_NM, MENU_USE_YN, WRT_PN_NO, WRT_PN_IP, WRT_DTTM, UPDT_PN_NO, UPDT_PN_IP, UPDT_DTTM) VALUES ( #{optrPgmNo}, #{optrPgmId}, #{optrPgmUrlV}, #{optrPgmGrpNo}, #{optrPgmNm}, #{menuUseYn}, #{loginUserNo#, #{remoteAddr}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{loginUserNo}, #{remoteAddr}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
mapper.update: /* site.program.service.ProgramService.updateProgramHandle */ UPDATE TB_OPTR_PGM_INFO SET OPTR_PGM_NM = #{optrPgmNm}, OPTR_PGM_ID = #{optrPgmId}, OPTR_PGM_URL_V = #{optrPgmUrlV}, OPTR_PGM_GRP_NO = #{optrPgmGrpNo}, MENU_USE_YN = #{menuUseYn}, UPDT_PN_NO = #{loginUserNo}, UPDT_PN_IP = #{remoteAddr}, UPDT_DTTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE OPTR_PGM_NO = #{optrPgmNo}
mapper.select: /* site.program.service.ProgramService.selectProgramInfo */ SELECT OPTR_PGM_NO, OPTR_PGM_ID, OPTR_PGM_URL_V, OPTR_PGM_GRP_NO, MENU_USE_YN, OPTR_PGM_NM FROM TB_OPTR_PGM_INFO A WHERE A.OPTR_PGM_NO = #{optrPgmNo}
